title: Unexpected Expense
description: Something breaks, needs repair, or you get hit with a surprise bill. Budget? What budget?
responses: Figure out how to cover it together
Adjust your budget going forward
Try not to let financial stress hurt your relationship

title: Family Drama
description: Family issues pull you in. Maybe conflict, crisis, or just complicated dynamics that affect your peace.
responses: Set boundaries where needed
Lean on your partner for support
Handle it without letting it consume you

title: Friend Crisis
description: A friend is going through something difficult and needs you. Supporting them is draining but necessary.
responses: Show up for them while protecting your own wellbeing
Include your partner in how to help
Balance compassion with boundaries

title: Work Drama
description: Workplace conflict, difficult colleagues, or professional challenges are bleeding into your personal life.
responses: Don't bring it home if you can help it
Talk through it with your partner
Consider if changes need to be made

title: Technology Failure
description: Your phone, computer, car, or essential device dies at the worst possible time. Modern life just got harder.
responses: Deal with the inconvenience with humor
Figure out repair vs replacement
Appreciate the forced digital detox

title: Schedule Chaos
description: Calendars collide, commitments conflict, and you're both stretched too thin. Something's gotta give.
responses: Prioritize ruthlessly
Communicate about what matters most
Make sure your relationship doesn't get lost in the chaos

title: Housing Issue
description: Landlord problems, neighbor disputes, maintenance nightmares - your living situation is complicated right now.
responses: Address the issue head-on
Consider if it's time to move
Don't let it poison your home life

title: Identity Documents Drama
description: Passport renewal, license issues, bureaucratic nightmares. The administrative side of life is biting you.
responses: Tackle it systematically
Ask your partner to help navigate it
Try to keep your sense of humor

title: Pet Emergency
description: If you have pets, one needs urgent vet care. If not, you're asked to help with someone else's pet crisis.
responses: Do what's necessary for the animal
Support each other through the worry
Don't let the cost paralyze you

title: Double Booking
description: You accidentally committed to two things at once, or made plans that now conflict. Awkwardness ensues.
responses: Apologize and resolve it honestly
Learn from the organizational failure
Don't beat yourself up too much

title: Lost or Stolen Item
description: Something important goes missing or gets stolen. Wallet, keys, sentimental item - the loss stings.
responses: Report it and take necessary steps
Let your partner comfort you
Try to move forward without dwelling

title: Miscommunication Cascade
description: One small miscommunication spirals into multiple problems. Messages crossed, assumptions made, chaos multiplied.
responses: Slow down and clarify everything
Take responsibility for your part
Laugh about it once it's resolved
